lenders.occupational_info: I translate technical documents, business communication and legal information. I believe that international trade promotes peace and stability in most cases, and I am pleased to contribute to that in my role as a translator.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: To give other people a chance to fully develop theirselfs and their business.

lenders.name: Haddon
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to influence social justice for hard working people worldwide.
lenders.occupational_info: I help a Chrisitan non-profit connect it's individual members over the internet. I also make films where our members can tell their own personal stories.

lenders.name: TJ & MARGE
lenders.loan_because: We want to contribute to global change.  We believe that empowering a woman strengthens her family, her community and the world!

lenders.name: Toby
lenders.loan_because: I believe many people have the talent to run a small business.  This is a way for me to help others like I have been helped many times.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I'm all about teaching people how to fish rather than giving them a fish.

lenders.name: shelly
lenders.loan_because: i have received loans and paid back loans that have allowed me to build my wealth. i lived in east africa, malawi, on the salary of that nation; one of the poorest economies in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: health care provider

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people develop a sustainable means of supporting their families and local communities.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I would like to lend money to people who are less fortunate than I am.

lenders.name: Mary Jane (MJ)
lenders.loan_because: It is important to me to help those that are willing to help themselves.  This program seems to reward people for hard work and diligence in the face of adversity.
lenders.occupational_info: Reduce waste and variation in the manufacturing process through a methodical program called Six Sigma

lenders.name: DONALD
lenders.loan_because: It helps someone and it makes you feel good.

lenders.name: Brianna
lenders.loan_because: everybody needs a little help and Kiva is a great concept.

lenders.name: Jonas
lenders.loan_because: I believe it empowers individuals and supports entrepreneurism.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in international relations, also development cooperation. Some of the projects are huge, take long to set up and even longer to take effect. Through Kiva, I can immediately address someone's request and see the positive impact when someone is quickly able to repay his loan.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Adolph
lenders.loan_because: I like to share and see others succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Help bank management to make better loans.

lenders.name: Damon Lewis
lenders.loan_because: I can and should

lenders.name: Niels
lenders.loan_because:
Some people need the support. If I can help some of them starting or improving their business so they eventualy can be self supporting then that would be a great feeling.

Also when a loan is payed back I can use that money again to help others. This makes it better then just giving money to charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain several flavours of webservers, cms servers, portal servers etc. Hosting a total of about 36.000 websites.

lenders.name: Laon Laan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help improve people's lives specially those who work hard for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer programs.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: Any little bit helps for those that are really trying to make ends meet for themselves and families in impoverished circumstances.

lenders.name: Amina
lenders.occupation: I am a Spanish teacher and a PhD student.
lenders.loan_because: My family comes from humble beginnings and I am very grateful for my parents' sacrifices. I am truly humbled and honored to help in any way  I can.
lenders.occupational_info: addicted to all things fiber (knitting, crochet spinning, quilting), compassionate, twin sister and chocolate lover.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Marc & Jane
lenders.loan_because: We want to share what we have received and loaning through Kiva connects me with the world. The teachings and the love of Jesus compel us to share what we have.

lenders.name: Dolcee
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs help sometime. I appreciate the opportunity to help someone who is trying to make a better life for themselves and their family .
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and now do charity work. I sew knapsacks for school children. They are sent all over the world. I knit for local charities.

lenders.name: Mary Jo Sisley
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the gifts I have been given.  By luck I was born in an area of the world that is free of violence and most natural disasters and is thriving economically.  I have been blessed.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of a microloan across the planet.
lenders.occupational_info: For 34 years I was involved in building buildings, and making sure they were built safely and correctly

lenders.name: janet
lenders.loan_because: I only have small amounts to lend and want those amounts to help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I help maintain computer software for electronic medical records. And I teach nurses and other clinicians how to use the software to keep track of their patients' information.

lenders.name: Virendra
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: Compassion -- people need help
lenders.occupational_info: Educational Catalyst, Writer, Traveler

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Marguerite
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell houses in the City of Tacoma.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Grant, Lord, that I may gladly share what I have with the needy, humbly ask for what I need from him who has, sincerely admit the evil I have done, calmly bear the evil I suffer, not envy my neighbor for his blessings, and thank You unceasingly whenever You hear my prayer.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I believe in changing systems by looking for the leverage points. Helping through Kiva is a leverage point.
lenders.occupational_info: I help organizations and communities think, learn, and work together  - better. I do this by shaping powerful questions, convening meaningful conversations, and creating access to the habits of systems thinking.

lenders.name: Daniel313
lenders.loan_because: I feel the desire to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I draw and manipulate machine parts on a computer.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others be successful and independant.
lenders.occupational_info: In the company I work for, I have a job that lets me help people get better and happier in their jobs.

lenders.name: Lemae
lenders.loan_because: My daughter Ursula introduced me to this great service! We're blessed by God to be a blessing for others!

lenders.name: BOBBY
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Guilbert
lenders.loan_because: I would like to start my own bicycle  cart business to sell General merchandize. ex:( toys, hangers, house decors, etc..).
lenders.occupational_info: I am now working as a street vendor selling general mechandize using bicycle cart. My boss is giving me commission on sales. Please help me start my own cart business.

lenders.name: Surya
lenders.loan_because: Giving for the benefit of someone deserving feels very good!
lenders.occupational_info: Hitech Mechanical Engineering. I try to make sure things are strong enough to meet requirements.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I can...

lenders.name: Matt C
lenders.loan_because: Global economic progress and prosperity leads to global peace.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a University Student studying political and governmental structures and processes.

lenders.name: Kat
lenders.loan_because:
1 John 3:17
"But if anyone has the world's goods and sees his brother in need, yet closes his heart against him, how does God's love abide in him?"

I am incredibly passionate about trying to help those who desire an education, those who are yearning to be self-sufficient, or individuals who wish to provide for their themselves and/or their families. Everyone deserves the opportunity to have a better life.

lenders.name: Kerry
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a difference.

lenders.name: Sheryl Lyon
lenders.occupation: Business Owner, A Much Better Way, LLC
lenders.loan_because: I have also been in a position where I could use a helping hand.  I feel it is imperative for me to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people discover more gentle, loving and earth friendly ways of parenting and living.

lenders.name: Harry
lenders.loan_because: I am committed to setting people free from economic, social, cultural, and institutionally imposed constraints. It's a matter of social justice.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an investment and financial planning consultant. I am a co-leader, with my wife, of the Turner Family Fund, a modest engaged philanthropy fund.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.occupation: Jack of all trades, master of none
lenders.loan_because:
I can: to whom much is given, much is due. 
I'm blessed to live where I can speak my mind and live a life with many freedoms; money should not be an obstacle, and I think every little amount matters.
lenders.occupational_info:
My tutoring job is always interesting, always something new. 
My producing job is nuanced and detailed, but über enjoyable and at times hap-hazardly intense (knowing that I have the power  to cut off someone's mic, to defy FCC regulations, to change commercials and to forget to switch feeds, all with the strength of a finger)...
I also do eBay, babysitting, web design, wedding photography, audio production, charity collecting, blah, blah, blah...

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I want to leave the world a better place than I found it, and this is a good start.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the US Military, and travel to many countries.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: Empowering people to make a change in their lives
lenders.occupational_info: Work with children with learning and behavioural needs

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: It is an opportunity to help people better themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help fix broken people.
